customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the GL-account for the bank account you would like to configure
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the GL-account for the bank account you would like to configure
customrecordcustomfield.label: GL-Account

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the currency of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the currency of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Currency

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the subsidiary of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the subsidiary of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiary

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the legal name of the subsidiary owning the bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the legal name of the subsidiary owning the bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiary Legal Name

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the name of the bank for the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the name of the bank for the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select which bill-currencies you would like to pay from this specific account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select which bill-currencies you would like to pay from this specific account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Pay Currencies

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the folder where the payment file format-files are located
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the folder where the payment file format-files are located
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment File Format-folder

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the payment file format for the correct bank (Not needed if Airtma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the payment file format for the correct bank (Not needed if Airtma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment File Format

customrecordcustomfield.description: Set the correct file-naming convention based on instructions from the bank. (Not needed if Aritma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Set the correct file-naming convention based on instructions from the bank. (Not needed if Aritma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment File - Naming Convention

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the folder ID where you want the payment proposal data to be stored
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the folder ID where you want the payment proposal data to be stored
customrecordcustomfield.label: Folder ID - Payment Data

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the folder ID where you want payment files to be stored. (Not needed if Aritma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the folder ID where you want payment files to be stored. (Not needed if Aritma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Folder ID - Payment Files

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the account number of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the account number of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Local Account number

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the IBAN of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the IBAN of the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: IBAN

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the BIC for the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the BIC for the selected bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: BIC/SWIFT

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the division for the bank account, if used by the bank (DNB)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the division for the bank account, if used by the bank (DNB)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Division

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the org.nr to the subsidiary owning the bank account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the org.nr to the subsidiary owning the bank account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Org.number

customrecordcustomfield.description:
Payments to US-accounts require either Bank Code or BIC, not both
Examples of Bank Codes are ABA routing no./ FedWire., and is often written on the invoice in the structure: FW+ 9 digits.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
Payments to US-accounts require either Bank Code or BIC, not both
Examples of Bank Codes are ABA routing no./ FedWire., and are often written on the invoice in the structure: FW+ 9 digits.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Code

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the street name of the bank the account belongs to
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the street name of the bank the account belongs to
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Street Name

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the city of the bank the account belongs to
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the city of the bank the account belongs to
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank City

customrecordcustomfield.description: Add the postal code/zip code of the bank the account belongs to
customrecordcustomfield.help: Add the postal code/zip code of the bank the account belongs to
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Postal Code

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the country where the bank is located
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the country where the bank is located
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Country

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box if this is the subsidiary’s preferred bank detail. If checked, bills with currencies not specified in any other Company Bank Details will be added to the payment proposals for this account.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if this is the subsidiary’s preferred bank detail. If checked, bills with currencies not specified in any other Company Bank Details will be added to the payment proposals for this account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Preferred Company Bank Detail

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select which days you would like the system to create payment proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select which days you would like the system to create payment proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Frequency

customrecordcustomfield.description: Set the time of day you want Payment Proposals to be generated
customrecordcustomfield.help: Set the time of day you want Payment Proposals to be generated
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Schedule

customrecordcustomfield.description: The value will decide which bills are added to the payment proposals. If you enter 1 here, the system will add bills with due date up until one day after today
customrecordcustomfield.help: The value will decide which bills are added to the payment proposals. If you enter 1 here, the system will add bills with due date up until one day after today
customrecordcustomfield.label: Days Before Due Date

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select which role should do first approval of Payment Proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select which role should do the first approval of Payment Proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.label: First Approver

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select which role should do second approval of Payment Proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select which role should do the second approval of Payment Proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Second Approver

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select which role should do final approval of Payment Proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select which role should do the final approval of Payment Proposals for this account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Final Approver

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box if Aritma-integration will be used
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if Aritma-integration will be used
customrecordcustomfield.label: API

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box if P002 files will be received from the bank. (Not needed if Aritma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if P002 files will be received from the bank. (Not needed if Aritma-integration is used)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Return File Reader from Bank (P002)
